objects.text:
• Handcrafted Gourmet Milkshake
• Fresh Donut With Sprinkles
• Pink Macaron Garnish
• Reusable Mason Jar

product_details.name: Ultimate Unicorn Dream Shake - Luxury Donut-Topped Mason Jar Milkshake
product_details.description:
• Handcrafted gourmet milkshake served in a classic mason jar
• Topped with a fresh pink-frosted donut with rainbow sprinkles
• Decorated with pink macaron garnish for extra luxury
• Generous swirl of fresh whipped cream with colorful sprinkles
• Perfect for Instagram-worthy moments and special celebrations
• Made with premium ice cream for ultimate creaminess
• Extra-large portion size for maximum indulgence
• Reusable mason jar with handle included
• Available for dine-in and takeaway orders
• Custom toppings can be added upon request

banner_details:
The banner is a vibrant, playful design divided into four colorful quadrants, creating a dynamic visual effect. The top-left section features bold, large-font text (`heading`) presenting the product name with a drop shadow-like circular highlight. Below it, `subheading` introduces the product category, and `tagline` adds urgency with a promotional message. The bottom-left quadrant is used for product highlights (`description`), a prominent price tag (`price`), a discount cue (`tagline_2`), and a bright call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`). On the right, the hero image (`product_image`) depicts a whimsical milkshake, overlaid with abstract decorative elements. 

**Color Palette:**
- Pink (#FF85B3)
- Purple (#9A59FF)
- Orange (#FFA33E)
- Sky Blue (#6BD4FF)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Hot Pink (#FF2895)
product_color: The product image features a whimsical and vibrant milkshake topped with colorful whipped cream, a doughnut, and candy elements, creating a fun and playful vibe. The dominant color is **pastel pink** (#F7C7D1), used in both the milkshake and macaron decorations. **Bright white** (#FFFFFF) highlights the whipped cream and creates contrast against vivid elements like **candy red** (#F94144), **lime green** (#B5E550), and **sunshine yellow** (#FFD166). The **doughnut beige** (#F5D5A0) blends softly with the pinks, while **multicolored sprinkles** add dynamic accents. This palette evokes sweetness and joy, ideal for attracting attention in bright, cheerful advertising banners.
